content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
I am having a fever right now.
Oh no! Make sure to drink plenty of fluids, such as water or electrolyte-rich drinks like coconut water or sports drinks, to help bring down your fever and stay hydrated.
I am having a head and my body is also quite shivering.

Sorry to hear that! Take a warm bath or use a warm compress to help relax your muscles and reduce shivering, and consider taking over-the-counter medications like acetaminophen or ibuprofen to help with your fever and body aches.
